   <h3 class="likesectionHead"><a 
 id="x3-20001"></a>print</h3>
<!--l. 5--><p class="noindent" ><div class="manref"></p>
<div class="flushleft" 
>
<!--l. 5--><p class="noindent" >
 <a 
 id="print"></a> <span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">print </span>&#x2013;                                            print variable value in the current output stream<br />
<a 
 id="fprint"></a> <span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">fprint </span>&#x2013;                                                             print variable value in a file stream<br />
<a 
 id="sprint"></a> <span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">sprint </span>&#x2013;                                                          print variable value in a string matrix</p></div>
<!--l. 9--><p class="noindent" ></div>
</p>
<!--l. 12--><p class="noindent" ><span class="paragraphHead"><a 
 id="x3-30001"></a><span 
class="cmbx-10x-x-109">Calling sequence</span></span>
                                                                                    

                                                                                    
</p>
   <div class="verbatim">
&#32;&#32;&#32;print(object&#32;[,options])
&#32;<br />&#32;&#32;&#32;fprint(fd,object&#32;[,options])
&#32;<br />&#32;&#32;&#32;S=sprint(fd,object&#32;[,options])
&#32;<br />&#32;&#32;&#32;where&#32;named&#32;options&#32;are
&#32;<br />&#32;&#32;&#32;as_read=boolean,&#32;depth=int,indent=int,&#32;latex=boolean,name=string,table=boolean)
</div>
<!--l. 19--><p class="nopar" >
</p>
<!--l. 22--><p class="noindent" ><span class="paragraphHead"><a 
 id="x3-40001"></a><span 
class="cmbx-10x-x-109">Parameters</span></span>
</p>
     <ul class="itemize1">
     <li class="itemize"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">object</span>: object to be printed.
     </li>
     <li class="itemize"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">as_read</span>: object is to be printed in such a way that the result can be parsed back by
     nsp.
     </li>
     <li class="itemize"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">depth</span>: control, for recursive objects, the depth at which printing is done.
     </li>
     <li class="itemize"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">indent</span>: indentation level.
     </li>
     <li class="itemize"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">name</span>: string used to override the variable name.
     </li>
     <li class="itemize"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">latex</span>: print in a <span class="LATEX">L<span class="A">A</span><span class="TEX">T<span 
class="E">E</span>X</span></span>matrix style.
     </li>
     <li class="itemize"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">table</span>: use table style instead of matrix style in <span class="LATEX">L<span class="A">A</span><span class="TEX">T<span 
class="E">E</span>X</span></span></li></ul>
<!--l. 36--><p class="noindent" ><span class="paragraphHead"><a 
 id="x3-50001"></a><span 
class="cmbx-10x-x-109">Description</span></span>
</p><!--l. 36--><p class="noindent" > prints the given variable in the current output stream (<span class="obeylines-h"><span class="verb"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">print</span></span></span>), or in a file steam (<span class="obeylines-h"><span class="verb"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">fprint</span></span></span>), or in a
string matric (<span class="obeylines-h"><span class="verb"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">sprint</span></span></span>). The file stream <span class="obeylines-h"><span class="verb"><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">fd</span></span></span> is an object of type <a 
href="#File">File</a>    which is created with <a 
href="#fopen">fopen</a>   .
                                                                                    

                                                                                    
</p>
<!--l. 43--><p class="noindent" ><span class="paragraphHead"><a 
 id="x3-60001"></a><span 
class="cmbx-10x-x-109">Examples</span></span>
</p>
   <div class="fancyvrb" id="fancyvrb1">
<a 
 id="x3-6002r1"></a><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;l</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;=list(rand(3,3),%t,</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;67,</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;&#x0022;scilab&#x0022;,list(5,6));</span>
<br class="fancyvrb" /><a 
 id="x3-6004r2"></a><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;</span><span 
class="cmtt-10x-x-109">&#32;print(l,depth=0);</span>
   </div>
